title: Google Places API radar search
description: Get more than 60 (ALL) results per query based on latitude, longitude and radius from the Google Places API.

apiKey.title: Google API key
apiKey.description: Required to get places nearby specified location

radiusMeters.title: Search radius in meters
radiusMeters.description: Search area in meters around coordinates

minRadiusMeters.title: Grid radius in meters
minRadiusMeters.description: Used to split search area into grid with cell size radius * 2

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: You need to use Apify proxy or custom proxies.
proxy.sectionDescription: How the browsers will behave during the scraping process.
